alert.note: Alert for Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Montmorency; Otsego; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Presque Isle, Cheboygan, northeastern Otsego, southeastern Emmet, northern Montmorency and southeastern Charlevoix Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 737 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brutus to near Boyne Falls. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indian River, Burt Lake State Park, Burt Lake, Reasoners Corner and Topinabee around 740 PM EDT. Aloha, Vanderbilt, Wolverine and Mullet Lake around 745 PM EDT. Aloha State Park, Alverno, Koehler Township, Afton and Pickerel Lake around 750 PM EDT. Eastern Corwith Township around 755 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Black Lake, Tower, Onaway, Onaway State Park, Allis Township, Canada Creek Ranch and Huron Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Montmorency; Otsego; Presque Isle
